name: Miner Dash
description:
### WORK IN PROGRESS ###
Gather materials to build and upgrade your rig for the upcoming race. Only the fastest will come out on top.....

Miner Dash is a strategical collect-a-thon and racing game put into one. Players will race to collect the most ores,worth various points, in one section of the game in order to build their racing RIGs for the next. Each RIG is different based on the way the player wants to play meaning there are potentially hundreds of ways you can win the final race. Only the fastest miner will come up on top.
